title: An answer to the wealthy grasier; or, An account of the pleasant passages on the wedding-day Tho' she was mean, yet like a queen, she did appear most gay; her Uncle Gold, she did behold, upon her wedding-day. Tune of, Ladies of London, this may be printed. R.P.
publisher: Printed for J. Deacon, at the Angel in Guilt-spur-street, without Newgate,
